correctness.rationale: Major schema and factual issues. Key problems: (1) Schema violations: plasmaPower is set to null (must be an object if present); dosingTime, purgeTime, flowRates, saturation, nucleationPeriod, and filmThickness are incorrectly nested inside thicknessControl instead of at processParameters level (required at the top level per schema). (2) Unsupported/fabricated parameters: pressure (10 mTorr), dosing/purge times (100 ms), flow rates, nucleation period (5 cycles), saturation, growth-per-cycle (0.1 Å) and number of cycles (100) are not reported in the article; growth-per-cycle × cycles is inconsistent with 10 nm (0.1 Å × 100 = 1 nm). (3) Reactant/co-reactant: The article lists IGZO precursors DADI, TMGa, DEZ but does not state the oxidant for IGZO ALD; assigning O2, carrierGas Ar, and purgingGas Ar is ungrounded. (4) Substrate misidentified: IGZO was deposited on HfO2 gate insulator in the stack, not directly on “SiO2/Si substrates.” (5) Reactor manufacturer "Hanyang University" is not a manufacturer; not supported by text. (6) Supercycle design is incorrect: IGZO ALD should comprise In2O3/Ga2O3/ZnO sub-cycles with an a:b:c ratio; the extraction uses a single “InGaZnO” subcycle and no ratio, which is not aligned with the described IGZO ALD method nor supported by the article. (7) Material properties largely invented and not traceable: refractive index, absorption coefficient, band gap (and "Tauc plot"), resistivity, carrier density ("Hall measurements"), uniformity, conformality, film density, and elemental concentration/atomic ratio are not reported. (8) Film composition atomic ratio "1.0:2.8:5.4" and XPS composition values are not in the paper. (9) Multiple content inaccuracies: coReactantFlow units/values unrelated to the only reported flow (25 sccm for CF4+O2 plasma used on HfO2, not for ALD); plasma power relevant to plasma treatment (50 W) is omitted/misapplied. (10) Only deviceProperties (μFE ≈ 38.9 cm2/V·s, SS ≈ 70 mV/dec, VTH ≈ 0.19 V, ION/IOFF ≈ 1e8, bottom-gate) match Device C; most other fields are incorrect or untraceable. Corrections needed: fix schema nesting; remove null plasmaPower; restrict entries to values present in the article (temperature 250 °C, film thickness 10 nm, amorphous phase, device metrics); accurately specify substrate as HfO2/W/SiO2/Si; omit unreported dosing/flow/pressure/co-reactant; and redesign supercycle to In2O3/Ga2O3/ZnO with ratios only if provided.

completeness.rationale: Largely non-traceable and partly incorrect. Many values appear fabricated or inferred without support from the article, and at least one ALD process described in the paper is missing. Specific issues: (1) Missing processes: the article reports two ALD processes—HfO2 by thermal ALD at 280 °C using TEMAHf (10 nm) and IGZO by ALD at 250 °C (10 nm). Only the IGZO process is represented; the HfO2 ALD process is absent. (2) Reactant selection: IGZO co-reactant is not reported, but the extraction sets O2; carrier/purging gases are not given in the article (set to Ar in extraction). (3) Supercycle design: IGZO ALD sub-cycles for In2O3/Ga2O3/ZnO and their a:b:c ratio are not provided in the paper; the extraction collapses to a single “InGaZnO” subcycle, which is inconsistent with the described IGZO ALD supercycle concept. (4) Process parameters: pressure (10 mTorr), dosing/purge times (100 ms), flow rates (10/20 sccm), nucleation period (5 cycles), growth-per-cycle (0.1 Å), number of cycles (100), saturation status, delivery method, and reactor manufacturer are all unsupported by the text; substrate is misrepresented (actual: IGZO deposited on HfO2/W/SiO2/Si stack, not bare SiO2/Si). (5) Material properties: refractive index, absorption coefficient, band gap, resistivity, carrier density, uniformity, conformality, elemental concentration and atomic ratio, roughness, and film density are not reported for the IGZO film; the extraction provides values without grounding. AFM roughness in the article pertains to HfO2, not IGZO. (6) Device properties: μFE=38.90 cm2/V·s, SS=70 mV/dec, and ION/IOFF≈1e8 for Device C are reported and correctly reflected; however, VTH sign appears ambiguous in the table (“GLYPH<0> 0.19”), while extraction assumes +0.19 V; hysteresis (10 mV) is discussed but not captured (no field in schema). (7) Schema compliance versus traceability: while required fields are filled, many values are not traceable to the article, undermining completeness and factual alignment. To improve: add a separate HfO2 ALD process (TEMAHf, 280 °C, 10 nm); for IGZO ALD, retain only supported fields (temperature 250 °C, film thickness 10 nm, precursors DADI/TMGa/DEZ, amorphous phase, bottom-gate device structure), remove or revise unsupported parameters (pressure, times, flows, GPC, nucleation, carrier/purge gases, co-reactant, supercycle design/ratio), and verify VTH sign.
